burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa

Class GradientDescentQLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.MDPSolver
      • burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa.ApproximateQLearning
        • burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa.GradientDescentQLearning
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LearningAgent, MDPSolverInterface, QFunction, QProvider, ValueFunction

    public class GradientDescentQLearning
extends ApproximateQLearning
    An implementation of Gradient Descent Q-learning. By default, updates the Q-function for the most recent example, but because it extends ApproximateQLearning, it can set to use experience replay and state Q-functions.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getLearningRate

        public LearningRate getLearningRate()

      • updateQFunction

        public void updateQFunction(List<EnvironmentOutcome> samples)
        Description copied from class: ApproximateQLearning
        Causes this objects value function approximation to be updated with respect to the provided experiences. This should result in the vfa data member being updated. Updates should be made using target Q-values of the next state from the stale Q-function, which can be accessed by the staleVfa data member.
        Specified by:
        updateQFunction in class ApproximateQLearning
        Parameters:
        samples - the experience samples to use for updating the Q-function.
